code: import{AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME}from'../const';export var getToken=function getToken(){var token=localStorage.getItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME);return token!==null&&token!==void 0?token:'';};export var saveToken=function saveToken(token){localStorage.setItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME,token);};export var dropToken=function dropToken(){localStorage.removeItem(AUTH_TOKEN_KEY_NAME);};
